resources.string: Hello, I\'m Monwar Jahan, and welcome to my rendition of the News Views App. Swipe Left to explore more of this app
Let\'s Explore More Of This App

This app uses two different APIs to show its data for two different features. Homepage shows a list of news sources . You can select a single source and get headlines from that one. You can also search a number of your choice to get facts and trivia about that number.
